0.1.1 (2024-07-28)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
- First release
- Add the following public API:
    - ``acore_soap_agent.api.SoapRequestLoader``
    - ``acore_soap_agent.api.SoapResponseDumper``
    - ``acore_soap_agent.api.gm``
- Add the following CLI command:
    - ``acoresoapagent hello``
    - ``acoresoapagent version``
    - ``acoresoapagent gm``
